attributes.action: Ban Al-Muhajiroun from protesting in Edgeware Road due to recent attacks on Shi'ite Muslims
attributes.additional_details:
On Friday 10th May 2013 there was an incident which took place in Edgeware Road where a group of protesters (Al Muhajiroun) attacked 2-5 Shi'ite Muslims just after Friday Prayers.

If you want to stop these unjustified acts sign this petition so that we can get those criminals off our streets.
